options.label: Gun Drone (Twin Pulse Carbine (18", A4, AP(1))
Pulse Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)) and Ritual Blade (A2)
Gun Drone (Twin Pulse Carbine (18", A4, AP(1))
Gun Drone (Twin Pulse Carbine (18", A4, AP(1))

specialRules.hint: This unit and all friendly units within 12" get +6" range when firing their Pulse Carbines.
specialRules.name: Accelerator Drone
specialRules.label: Accelerator Drone
specialRules.description: This unit and all friendly units within 12" get +6" range when firing their Pulse Carbines.

specialRules.hint: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12" of this model.
specialRules.name: Beacon
specialRules.label: Beacon
specialRules.description: Friendly units using Ambush may ignore distance restrictions from enemies if they are within 12" of this model.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of these powers, and the hero and all friendly models within 12" get one of these rules until the end of the round: " Wind: +3" when moving.
specialRules.name: Elemental Power
specialRules.label: Elemental Power
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of these powers, and the hero and all friendly models within 12" get one of these rules until the end of the round: " Wind: +3" when moving.

specialRules.hint: Enemies charge -3" against this unit and all friendly units within 12".
specialRules.name: Inhibitor Drone
specialRules.label: Inhibitor Drone
specialRules.description: Enemies charge -3" against this unit and all friendly units within 12".

specialRules.hint: The model and all friendly units within 12" count as having Regeneration.
specialRules.name: Shield Drone
specialRules.label: Shield Drone
specialRules.description: The model and all friendly units within 12" count as having Regeneration.

specialRules.hint: This model may try to mark an enemy instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one unit within 36" and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it"s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to give all friendly units +X to their shooting rolls against it until the end of the round, where X is the number of removed markers.
specialRules.name: Spotting Laser
specialRules.label: Spotting Laser
specialRules.description: This model may try to mark an enemy instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one unit within 36" and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it"s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to give all friendly units +X to their shooting rolls against it until the end of the round, where X is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1A to their Pulse Shotguns, Carbines or Rifles when using Hold actions.
specialRules.name: Volley Fire
specialRules.label: Volley Fire
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1A to their Pulse Shotguns, Carbines or Rifles when using Hold actions.

spells.name: Patience
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" gets Stealth next time it is shot at.

spells.name: Killing Blow
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Boldness
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately move by up to 3".

spells.name: Devastating Strike
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Pacification
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" gets -3 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Deadly Surge
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12" take 6 automatic hits each.
